title: Electronics in action
creator_credit: Raytheon Manufacturing Company and Lee A. Ellis
brief_description: The history of Raytheon Manufacturing Company since its founding in 1922. The company’s facilities and products; the electronics industry - guided missiles, electronic computers, medical diathermy equipment, vacuum tubes and small transistors.
